description: First 6 months of life: Breastmilk is the only food and drink an infant needs.
title: First 6 months of life: Breastmilk is the only food and drink an infant needs
content:
- Exclusive breastfeeding in the first six months gets baby off to a
   good start in life.

 - Mother’s milk is an important source of energy, protein and other
   nutrients such as vitamin A and iron for babies.

 - Feeding only breastmilk will also help protect baby against diarrhoea
   and other common infections.

 - Learn more about breastfeeding [here][1].


  [1]: http://my.ffl.hub.unicore.io/content/list/1ea47579bccd4d0d85e0ffa5c3ce3cda/
